page.title: 01AN OVERVIEW
page.content: Our area is mainly farming and residential,with a fairly large amount of woodland.It is a beautiful area with lovely walks by the river,and up Kinnoull Hill.Tay Street is a pleasant 19th Century lime tree shaded street over looking the River Tay.Most people here are very grateful for the beautiful environment they live in.The recreational facilities in this area are excellent with lots of open space for the citizens to enjoy. In the middle ages Perth was a busy port with ships coming right up the Tay to the foot of the High Street. Nowadays heavy traffic crosses the Tay at the two bridges as all traffic between the south and the busy north east of Scotland must cross the Tay at Perth.
